positions.subtitle: GoMechanic.in
positions.description: •	Spearheaded in depth analysis on add-on services purchased the most and updated the existing add-on services, increased their purchase by 4%. •	Improved Malaysia Sign up by new users by more than 10%, by finding issue in OTP triggering with wrong country code in Malaysia.•	Incorporated tracking events for identifying pain points in user journey and remove unnecessary step of add-ons bottom sheet with tyre and battery category which is causing drop of more than 70% users.•	Performed user flow analysis for different features and using Google Analytics to find which features used most and which can be improved.•	Strong command on building automated reports using python and SQL, helps in tracking business performance by automating funnel report, app orders report and escalation reports. •	Proficient in data handling and cleaning from multiple sources using python and converting them into useful insights by data visualisation tools for stakeholders.•	Analysed search terms using SQL and Excel for introducing new car services based on user research. •	Experience with working with nested queries and joins in both python and SQL for data manipulation for analysis. •	Have a sound knowledge of funnels and reports of Google Analytics 4 in tracking customer behaviour.
positions.title: Product Analyst
positions.description_html:
• Spearheaded in depth analysis on add-on services purchased the most and updated the existing add-on services, increased their purchase by 4%.
• Improved Malaysia Sign up by new users by more than 10%, by finding issue in OTP triggering with wrong country code in Malaysia.
• Incorporated tracking events for identifying pain points in user journey and remove unnecessary step of add-ons bottom sheet with tyre and battery category which is causing drop of more than 70% users.
• Performed user flow analysis for different features and using Google Analytics to find which features used most and which can be improved.
• Strong command on building automated reports using python and SQL, helps in tracking business performance by automating funnel report, app orders report and escalation reports.
• Proficient in data handling and cleaning from multiple sources using python and converting them into useful insights by data visualisation tools for stakeholders.
• Analysed search terms using SQL and Excel for introducing new car services based on user research.
• Experience with working with nested queries and joins in both python and SQL for data manipulation for analysis.
• Have a sound knowledge of funnels and reports of Google Analytics 4 in tracking customer behaviour.

positions.subtitle: GoMechanic.in
positions.description: •	Geomechanic is India’s leading multi-brand car service company, committed to making the car servicing experience hassle-free & easy for everyone. •	Performed Exploratory Data analysis using tools like MS Excel, Python Jupyter notebooks by employing libraries like Pandas and NumPy.•	Prepared various data insights involving clicks on different events which trigger on basis of user engagement with the retail mobile app•	Prepared reports with useful insights regarding customer behaviour for different services and features.•	Developed strategies for solving problems regarding defining the core problem for analysis, collecting the data from various collections and tables  of different databases including Google Big query, MongoDB, Firebase, and google analytics.•	Developed weekly reports for important metrics like clicks on different carousals, different services, and products on the retail app and automate the process using Google Big Query and Data studio to keep a close track of consumer behaviour based on new features and offers in our retail app.•	Performing Debugging using Firebase based on different events in the retail app.•	Performed analysis by making funnels using Google Analytics 4 for tracking customer behaviour.
positions.title: Technology Intern
positions.description_html:
• Geomechanic is India’s leading multi-brand car service company, committed to making the car servicing experience hassle-free & easy for everyone.
• Performed Exploratory Data analysis using tools like MS Excel, Python Jupyter notebooks by employing libraries like Pandas and NumPy.
• Prepared various data insights involving clicks on different events which trigger on basis of user engagement with the retail mobile app
• Prepared reports with useful insights regarding customer behaviour for different services and features.
• Developed strategies for solving problems regarding defining the core problem for analysis, collecting the data from various collections and tables of different databases including Google Big query, MongoDB, Firebase, and google analytics.
• Developed weekly reports for important metrics like clicks on different carousals, different services, and products on the retail app and automate the process using Google Big Query and Data studio to keep a close track of consumer behaviour based on new features and offers in our retail app.
• Performing Debugging using Firebase based on different events in the retail app.
• Performed analysis by making funnels using Google Analytics 4 for tracking customer behaviour.

experience.title: Production Engineer
experience.description: •	Eminence Industries is a leading PEB metal fabricator having their works in Samaypur Badli, Delhi. •	Involved in manufacturing of roofing and cladding panels for state-of-the-art facilities for different industries stretching from Railway Stations to Luxurious farmhouses.•	Worked as a part-time employee in the production department of the company for 1 year. •	Handled a team of 10 people.•	Operated PLC controllers’ machines.•	Prepared excel sheets for the stock, client quotations and daily dispatch reports which helped the company to develop better purchase strategies. •	Helped to reduce the Operating cost and inventory carrying cost of the business by 30 percent.•	Performed also as a maintenance engineer for the machinery in the plant and successfully devised a better roller alignment technique for machinery settings which helps in the reduction of setup time to 50 percent.
experience.description_html: • Eminence Industries is a leading PEB metal fabricator having their works in Samaypur Badli, Delhi. • Involved in manufacturing of roofing and cladding panels for state-of-the-art facilities for different industries stretching from Railway Stations to Luxurious farmhouses.• Worked as a part-time employee in the production department of the company for 1 year. • Handled a team of 10 people.• Operated PLC controllers’ machines.• Prepared excel sheets for the stock, client quotations and daily dispatch reports which helped the company to develop better purchase strategies. • Helped to reduce the Operating cost and inventory carrying cost of the business by 30 percent.• Performed also as a maintenance engineer for the machinery in the plant and successfully devised a better roller alignment technique for machinery settings which helps in the reduction of setup time to 50 percent.

experience.title: Co Head Electrical Research and Development Division
experience.description: •	Member in Formula Student Electric Vehicle team Hertz Electric.The team comprised of dedicated engineers working on developing electric vehicle technology with an aim to provide a fully electric Formula student race car.•	Designed and improvised the 4 major electrical circuits and Printed Circuit Boards (PCBs) with the help of Proteus Suite.•	Presented the designs developed by my team for approval for production.•	Negotiated with various PCB manufacturers and get our vehicles circuit boards manufactured by one of the pioneers in the PCB Manufacturing the PCB Power.•	Led and Trained a team of 5 junior electrical engineering students.
experience.description_html: • Member in Formula Student Electric Vehicle team Hertz Electric.The team comprised of dedicated engineers working on developing electric vehicle technology with an aim to provide a fully electric Formula student race car.• Designed and improvised the 4 major electrical circuits and Printed Circuit Boards (PCBs) with the help of Proteus Suite.• Presented the designs developed by my team for approval for production.• Negotiated with various PCB manufacturers and get our vehicles circuit boards manufactured by one of the pioneers in the PCB Manufacturing the PCB Power.• Led and Trained a team of 5 junior electrical engineering students.
